ygData.subject: Re: AzureBlade and Mistra! (Location: North Amercia)
ygData.msgSnippet: AzureBlade was overjoyed to hear her words. He wanted to yell his happiness, but he refrained and simply smiled. He smiled widely, but he only smiled.

AzureBlade was overjoyed to hear her words. He wanted to yell his 
happiness, but he refrained and simply smiled. He smiled widely, but 
he only smiled.

AzureBlade: I respect your choice and I appreciate it. It is ironic 
though! I had just told them I wanted to be left alone for some times, 
and I am about to come back with a new rookie! Do you think you'll be 
able to fly though? It is a long way...

--- In nbwrpg@y..., HanaKirei85@a... wrote:
> <<> AzureBlade knew he had worried her.
> > 
> > AzureBlade: Please relax. You need to fear nothing from me. 
Perhaps I 
> > can help you find out who you are. I have some kind of talents 
that i 
> > could use. I can dive and help your spark find its way. Even if it 
> > turns out you are a Predacon, I will not hurt you nor will I try 
to 
> > modify your spark. I have sworn it and I still intend to uphold my 
> > word. But if you prefer to find another, I can help you find 
one.>>
> 
> "You...could help me?" Mistra hesistated...would she want someone to 
be doing 
> that to her spark? Someone she barely knew just yet..? He had sworn 
not to 
> hurt her, true, and she believed him. A conclusion came to her.
> 
> "Any help to find my identity would be appreaciated...however, not 
yet. If 
> the offer would still be available to me later I mean...but for now, 
I'd be 
> most grateful if I could join your side...for the time at least?" 
Feeling as 
> though she hadn't provided enough of a reason, she added "To see if 
anyone on 
> whatever side I was on cares enough to choose and come after me, as 
you did. 
> If not, I would gladly stay with your faction."
